question: Show novels and poems that are written in Italian.
sql_query1:
SELECT Literatures.Title 
FROM Literatures
WHERE (Literatures.LiteratureType = "Novel" OR Literatures.LiteratureType = "Poem") AND Literatures.Language = "Italian"
sql_query2:
SELECT Literatures.Title 
FROM Literatures
WHERE Literatures.LiteratureType = "Novel" OR Literatures.LiteratureType = "Poem" AND Literatures.Language = "Italian"
interpretation1: What novels are written in Italian and what poems are in the same language?
interpretation2: Provide a list of all novels and also list poems that are written in Italian.
